DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy TAK-385 40 mg administer orally daily 12 week , compare leuprorelin injection ( once/4 week , 1.88 mg 3.75 mg SC/time ) participant uterine fibroid .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 3 Study Evaluate Efficacy Safety TAK-385 40 mg Compared With Leuprorelin Treatment Uterine Fibroids
DOC.detailed_description: This phase 3 , multicenter , randomize , double-blind , parallel-group , non-inferiority study evaluate efficacy safety TAK-385 administer orally daily dose 40 mg 24 week , compare leuprorelin injection ( once/4 week , 1.88 mg 3.75 mg subcutaneous [ SC ] /time ) premenopausal participant ≥ 20 year age symptomatic uterine fibroid . The primary objective study evaluate efficacy TAK-385 40 mg administer orally daily 12 week . Participants must diagnose uterine fibroid confirm transvaginal ultrasound method , symptom menorrhagia . The total number participant randomize double-blind condition 288 ( 144 participant TAK-385 40 mg group leuprorelin group ) .
